channel.title: How do I change all the exp rates to 1500? 317 server
channel.description: Like the combat code I know is Hitdiff * 1500, but how can I change the exp rate for ALL skills like that, is there a certain code or does anyone know the seperate codes? Thanks for the help. Using a 317 DDSSpeced

item.title: How do I change all the exp rates to 1500? 317 server
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

Well, maybe in your client java it says Hitdiff* 1500 then like // slashed. If u edit that, all slash attacks get 1500 xp each hit.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change all the exp rates to 1500? 317 server
